blogPost.excerpt: A small web app that lets everyone in on the Bernie Sanders sitting fun
blogPost.body: A small web app that lets everyone in on the Bernie Sanders sitting fun
blogPost.title: Bernie Sitting - Add sitting Bernie to any photo
blogPost.author: Niko Draca

localize.description: 一个小小的网络应用，让大家参与到伯尼-桑德斯的坐庄乐趣中来。
localize.tagline: 将坐着的伯尼添加到任何照片中

localize.description: 一個小小的網絡應用，讓大家參與到伯尼-桑德斯的坐莊樂趣中來。
localize.tagline: 將坐着的伯尼添加到任何照片中

previous.excerpt: Nice backgrounds. Get inspired whenever you open a new tab. I'll upload a new Bernie in Mittens image daily. Have something you'd want to share with the world in this way? Email josh@sirchit.com
previous.title: Bernie in Mittens - A new Bernie in Mittens with your new tabs.

localize.description: 漂亮的背景。每当你打开一个新的标签时，就会得到灵感。我每天都会上传一张新的 "穿米特斯的伯尼 "图片。有什么东西你想以这种方式与世界分享？发邮件给 josh@sirchit.com
localize.tagline: 一个新的伯尼在Mittens和你的新标签。

localize.description: 漂亮的背景。每當你打開一個新的標籤時，就會得到靈感。我每天都會上傳一張新的 "穿米特斯的伯尼 "圖片。有什麼東西你想以這種方式與世界分享？發郵件給 josh@sirchit.com
localize.tagline: 一個新的伯尼在Mittens和你的新標籤。

next.excerpt: Time is the most important thing, save it! You can remove uploading product images from your to-do list, Smart Image Upload handles all of your product images at once.
next.title: Smart Image Upload for Shopify - Bulk upload product images and save your time

localize.description: 时间是最重要的，节约时间吧! 您可以将上传产品图片从您的待办事项中删除，智能图片上传一次处理所有的产品图片。
localize.tagline: 批量上传产品图片，节省您的时间

localize.description: 時間是最重要的，節約時間吧! 您可以將上傳產品圖片從您的待辦事項中刪除，智能圖片上傳一次處理所有的產品圖片。
localize.tagline: 批量上傳產品圖片，節省您的時間
